name: aisbs
description: AI Solved Business Solutions - Closed RAG web app

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently --shell powershell.exe "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.build-and-dev: npm run build && concurrently --shell powershell.exe "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"

author: AISBS
